content: Enter the address of the service where you'd like to embed or connect your {{organizationName}} {{productName}}.

comment.text: This translation key provides a text that will be displayed to users when they need to enter an address of a service to embed or connect their organization's product. The text explains the required action in simple terms. It appears on a page related to portal settings and is likely used as a help message or tooltip.

usage.context:
<>
 <CategoryHeader>
 {t("CSPHeader", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })}
 </CategoryHeader>
 <Container className="description-holder">
 {t("CSPDescription", {
 productName: t("Common:ProductName"),
 organizationName: logoText,
 })}
 <HelpButton
 className="csp-helpbutton"
